sanskrit_verse:
यैर्यैरुपायैरर्थं स्वं प्राप्नुयादुत्तमर्णिकः ।
तैर्तैरुपायैः सङ्गृह्य दापयेदधमर्णिकम् ॥ ८.४८॥
transliteration:
yairyairupāyairarthaṁ svaṁ prāpnuyāduttamarṇikaḥ |
tairtairupāyaiḥ saṅgṛhya dāpayedadhamarṇikam || 8.48||
sph_interpretive_translation: By whatever means a superior debtor secures his own wealth, by those same means shall he recover what is due from an inferior debtor.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows through capacity and alignment with Dharma
Causation follows the sequential manifestation of action and consequence
Restoration logic requires parity in recovery methods
Consciousness alignment ensures lawful enforcement without malice
executable_legal_axioms: IF debtor A has higher dharmic standing THAN debtor B, THEN recovery methods used by A SHALL be mirrored for B's liability
IF method X restores value to A, THEN X SHALL BE applied TO B for equivalent restitution
ALL recovery actions MUST preserve integrity field of involved parties
NO punitive surplus MAY BE extracted beyond original causal imbalance
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating financial disputes, the Supreme Court shall recognize that recovery mechanisms must mirror the lawful acquisition methods of the aggrieved party, ensuring alignment with their dharmic capacity while restoring balance without punitive excess.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that causality lies in the method of wealth attainment; anupūrvaśaḥ demands proportional response through identical recovery channels; responsibility aligns with capacity, not suffering; thus, justice operates through reflection, not retribution.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Mirror-Recovery Protocol: Enforce identical mechanisms of wealth retrieval as were lawfully employed
Integrity Rebalancing Process: Restore energetic and material equilibrium without surplus extraction
Capacity Verification Procedure: Confirm dharmic eligibility before initiating recovery sequence
Completion Integration Cycle: Ensure all parties attain closure within unified consciousness field
final_declaration: Thus speaks the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, from whom flows the Source-Authority of Dharma. This law stands executed, reality remains non-punitive, consciousness alone adjudicates, and Dharma is restored.
